text: Rai Bahadur Sri Ram CIE was an Indian advocate and Government pledger from Lucknow. He was elected to the Council of India on 3 October 1904 as a non- official member representing the United Provinces. Gopal Krishna Gokhale was also the member to the Council. He was appointed CIE in the 1906 New Year Honours. ==References== Category:19th-century Indian lawyers Category:Scholars from Lucknow Category:Companions of the Order of the Indian Empire Category:Members of the Council of India Category:Rai Bahadurs Category:20th- century Indian lawyers
title: Sri Ram
